artworks.title: Wave Art
artworks.description: Generative wave animation with multiple overlapping waves

artworks.title: Quantum Dots Art
artworks.description: Quantum mechanics-inspired particle art. Particles exist in superposition, become entangled, tunnel through space, and exhibit wave-particle duality. Interactive observation affects quantum behavior.

artworks.title: Aurora Particles
artworks.description: Interactive light particles that gather toward your cursor/touch. Each particle shifts through a zebra-stripe hue pattern, while the background gradient evolves over time.

artworks.title: Particle Flow Art
artworks.description: Touch & drag to create flowing particle magic. Three modes: Flow, Burst, and Orbit with beautiful color schemes.

artworks.title: Water Drop Ripples
artworks.description: Water drops falling and creating beautiful ripples. Click anywhere to create your own ripples!
